name: Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum with Niacinamide
about: What it is: A hydrating eye serum with caffeine and niacinamide to help depuff, brighten the look of dark circles, and visibly address fine lines from dryness...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness, Puffiness..Formulation: Lightweight Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Green Tea: rich in amino acids and antioxidants to help provide moisture to the skin.- 2% Caffeine: helps energize and visibly depuff.- 3% Niacinamide: helps brighten dull areas..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, mineral oil, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Skincare meets massage tool in this all-in-one eye serum, with hydrating, depuffing, & brightening benefits. Target tired eyes with a blend of Korean Beauty Green Tea (designed for skincare, not sipping!), hyaluronic acid, energizing caffeine, and brightening niacinamide --mess-free!..Clinical Results:.Self-assessment from clinical, 30 women, after 2 weeks of daily use:.- 100% felt their eye area was less dry after 1 use..- 96% saw their eye area looked brighter, less tired & less puffy after using for 2 weeks...Instrumental result, 30 women, after 2 weeks of daily use:.- 13% reduced puffiness and 23% boost in hydration levels after 1 use...Dermatologically tested. Alternative eye irritation tested...CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Green Tea and Five Types of Hyaluronic Acid: Antioxidant rich, helps hydrate dry areas..-2% Caffeine: Helps support and visibly depuff..-3% Niacinamide: Helps brighten dull areas...Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Caffeine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Squalane, Polysorbate 20, Polysilicone-11, Pca Dimethicone, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Carbomer, Boron Nitride, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Tromethamine, Dimethiconol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Glyceryl Caprylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Disodium Edta, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Arginine, Cyclodextrin, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tin Oxide, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Pump down once and dot around both eye areas. .- Use massage tip to smooth around in circular motions to help absorb, depuff and refresh. .- Use AM & PM, or throughout the day...Recycling Instructions:.-innisfree partners with TerraCycle® on a no-waste recycling program to give your empties a second life..-Request your recycling envelope at terracycle.com/en-us/brigades/innisfree.-Gather all your clean empty innisfree products, rinse them, and place them in any box..-Log in to your TerraCycle® account at terracycle.com to download and print a free shipping label at any time..-Simply drop off at your designated local shipping provider and we’ll do the rest.

reviews.review_text: The Innisfree Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum is a great new addition to my daily routine! I would highly recommend this product to any one that has dark circles such as I do, and to any one who feels they need a pick me up in the under-eye department!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using a caffeine eye serum for a while now, and it’s definitely a game-changer for my mornings. The serum feels super lightweight and absorbs quickly, which is perfect when I’m in a rush. It really helps with puffiness—within minutes, my under-eyes look less swollen, and I feel more awake. For dark circles, the improvement is more gradual. It doesn’t completely erase them, but it does brighten the area over time, which is a win for me. One thing I love is how smooth my under-eyes feel after applying it, and it doesn’t mess with my makeup at all. If your serum comes with a cooling applicator, it’s a total bonus. The cooling effect feels amazing and makes the whole process even more refreshing. Just a tip: pair it with a hydrating eye cream if you have dry skin, as the serum alone might not be enough.

reviews.review_title: A Wake-Up Call for Tired Eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum complimentary for testing, and it has quickly become a favorite in my skincare routine! As someone with sensitive, combination skin, I’m always on the lookout for products that work without irritation, and this serum exceeded my expectations. What I Loved: • Soothing Formula: The green tea gives a refreshing and calming effect, perfect for reducing puffiness in the morning. • Visible Brightening: After a few days of consistent use, I noticed a visible reduction in dark circles and an overall brighter under-eye area. • Lightweight Texture: The serum absorbs quickly, leaving no greasy residue—great for layering under makeup or sunscreen. • Gentle on Skin: It didn’t cause any irritation, even on my sensitive skin. Room for Improvement: I’d love to see a slightly larger bottle because I can see myself running out quickly—it’s that good! Overall: The Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum is a game-changer for tired eyes and busy mornings. If you’re looking for a gentle yet effective solution for dark circles and puffiness, this serum is worth trying. I’ll definitely be recommending it to friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wowowowow! I LOVE the applicator and the serum itself. So so so nourishing and the ball tip is cooling and such a luxe experience. Highly recommend and buying this for my friends and family!! Great stocking stuffer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice brightening eye cream. I love the packaging! The roller ball is my favorite method of applying eye creams and the size of this rollerball makes it perfect for getting into the inner corner and making sure that the cream is applied evenly around the eye. The pump used to dispense the product is a bit touchy. It takes some trial and error to figure out a way to pump it without dispensing. Far too much product. I believe the packaging says to use one or two pumps, but I found that to be far too much for what I needed. Half a pump was more than enough for each eye. Overall, I haven’t noticed any brightening effects, but I have definitely noticed an increase in moisture retention around my eye area. I am able to wear this under makeup without it, causing my eyelids to become greasy or my makeup to crease. It provides a great amount of moisture without providing too much moisture, if that makes sense! Overall, I feel like this is a fantastic eye moisturizer that in my opinion can be targeted towards 18-30-year-olds because of the amount of moisture provides being somewhere in the middle. As far as hydration goes. Most importantly though, this eye cream is incredibly Soothing. It does not irritate the eye area at all - I even accidentally got some in my eye the first time I used it And it didn’t cause any irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best eye serums i have used for my dark circles. It really hydrates my under eyes and fights the discoloration. The packaging of this serum is so good . It has niacinamide and other ingredients that brightens the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a caffeinated eye cream due to dark circles and having a very active toddler, lol. I wanted my eyes to feel and look refreshed. This eye cream from innisfree contains caffeine from green tea which has really helped improve the appearance of my dark circles. Applying the eye cream soothes my eyes and is therapeutic itself. reviews.review_title: A great eye serum to hydrate the eyes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for an honest review. I use this serum every day in the AM. I like to use the roll-on applicator to apply the serum, because it helps distribute product, massage it in, and de-puff the eye area. The serum is very thin and silky, which is the perfect consistency for an eye serum. I've used thicker formulas from other brands in the past and find they feel too heavy in comparison. I have normal/combination skin so this serum is perfect. Once it is massaged into the skin, the eye area is left feeling soft and matte. I did not experience any sensitivity using this serum and my eyes in general felt fine so no problems there. No notable fragrance either. I'll keep using it, but I have yet to see any effects on my under eyes (and I don't really have puffy eyes so I'm not sure how much it helps on that end).  One thing I think could be improved is the pump to dispense the product feels a little finicky, it took me a few pumps to get it to work properly (which is normal) but every time I had to press on the pump, it seemed to move around a little. This might just be a small packaging issue but this was the only issue I had, and it was a minor one.

I don’t usually use eye creams and products like this but it was so pleasant and refreshing. The applicator has a metal tip which stays cold without being refrigerated. This alone feels amazing and definitely helps depuff the eye area. The caffeine and other skincare help to moisturize and brighten the delicate skin. This has become one of my favourite parts of my morning routine before or even if I don’t plan on wearing makeup for the day. I would recommend to literally anyone and would imagine they would also fall in love. Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I'm a big fan of the Innisfree brand so was excited to try the eye serum. I love the applicator, the button to  depress and pump out some product and then the roller ball to massage was fabulous, much better than traditional roller balls where you end up with too much product. I found this to have a gel consistency that did not play well with my makeup so I recommend using at night. I don't have sensitive skin and I experienced no reactions. I found it left my undereyes feeling refreshed in the morning and less puffy. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this eye cream! I have been using it in the mornings and have noticed my eyes look less puffy and more energized! I have sensitive eyes, yet this formula didn't irritate my eyes (probably because of the alcohol/fragrance free formula). The gel is lightweight, smooth and unscented; applies white but becomes clear. The packaging is simple but chic, I adore the cooling eye roller as the application (like WOW!!), Very easy to use and easy to travel with. I highly recommend, a real must have, and this will probably be a re-occurring purchase for me! I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purchases. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. Affordable caffeinated niacinamide.  I wake up for work at 5 AM and always have puffy eyes. the caffeine definitely puff them a lot faster than usual. I have never use niacinamide on my eyes, but I felt like it got rid of some of the bumps under my eyes. The serum is smooth, and the applicator ball is cold and glides nicely. The applicator did not pull on my eyes at all and was easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it’s a roll on application. It feels nice rolling it under the eyes. Lightly scented which is a huge bonus for me. I find it instantly helped reduce the puffiness and left my under eye hydrated, especially right now during winter my under eyes get super dry. I will definitely purchase this product in the future. I received this product for free from Topbox Marketing for testing and review purposes. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have an oily skin type and am very acne prone. I have not had any more breakouts due to this product and it does not burn my under eyes at all. I like to use it in the morning since they're ia caffeine and use another eye cream at night. I also really like the cooling effect the silver roller ball has but I do wish it helped your skim absorb it more. I have to go in after applying with my ring fingers to really blend and dissolve into my skin. Otherwise - love it! One of my favorite parts of my morning skin care and its a great price. I'd give it a 4.5 if that was an option.

reviews.review_title: Had an allergic reaction and had to go to the E.R.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought and used this product and within less than 2 minutes my eyes started swelling! My eyes were black, blue and purple and still are the next day. I had an anaphylactic reaction to this eye serum! My eyes swelled shut, were severely irritated and bruised, and my face swelled up. I use a lot of new products and have never been allergic nor ever had a reaction. THIS WAS THE WORST AND MOST TERRIFYING EXPERIENCE OF MY LIFE!! I wrote to Sephora and Innisfree and Sephora has ignored me and Innisfree asked me if I was sure it was their product because they do rigorous testing. THIS WAS THE ONLY PRODUCT I USED! OF COURSE I KNOW WHICH PRODUCT ALMOST KILLED ME!! I also tried it on my hubby the same night and his eyes watered a lot the next day but his eyes not face swelled up at all just me. BUYERS BEWARE PLEASE! IF YOURE SENSITIVE TO PRODUCTS I WOULDN'T EVEN TRY IT! I'M NOT SENSITIVE TO PRODUCTS AT ALL AND LOOK WHAT HAPPENED TO ME, WHAT DO YOU THINK COULD HAPPEN TO YOU? Sephora should be ashamed of themselves also because I reached out to them and Innisfree and was completely ignored by Sephora..... so scary be careful y'all!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Loving the Rollerball On My Puffy Eyes! 💚
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been on an Innisfree kick recently and have been building up all sorts of skincare made by them. My newest addition is their new Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum. I have the toner from the same line and really like them both! 💚  The Innisfree Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum is a hydrating eye serum with niacinamide, caffeine, and a cooling rollerball applicator. I only have one other eye product with the rollerball applicator and I honestly really love it! I suffer from really bad dark circles, puffiness and fine lines around my eyes.  So I’m all for an eye product to help me battle these issues. While I really like the results I get from using this eye serum, I also have sensitive, reactive eyes and this eye serum burns my eyes if I get it too close to them. 💚  I just have to be very careful when applying. The packaging is nice, it’s a long tube that you pump the tip of, it dispenses a small amount of product from the rollerball and then you just use the roller ball to spread out the eye serum and let it work it’s magic! The rollerball feels so good on my puffy under eyes and I really am liking that my dark circles are less prominent. Usually my eyes have very deep, dark, dark circles and they are definitely starting to improve. 💚  Innisfree Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum is really hydrating and does a great job brightening my under eyes. I just really wish it didn’t irritate my eyes sometimes. Other than that, I really am enjoying it and happy to have had the opportunity to try it. I’m looking forward to seeing how it improves my under eyes after a little longer of usage. 💚

reviews.review_text: I can’t say I’ve noticed a difference just yet, but the applicator is great. You can massage it in and feels so nice around the eye especially when cold. This line has a great smell as well and I love it as part of my routine.

reviews.review_text: Bought this for my bf as a beginner under eye treatment. He loves it. Loves the cooling ball. His under eyes feel very hydrated (his words lol). And he says he feels his under have become lighter! Good price point too :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The shade is so perfect for the skin plus the dewyness is beyond words! Keeps my lips hydrated and smells amazing! Plus it is so soft looking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely worth it!! I've used it 4 times and I've noticed a big difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy application and I really like the scent. It's especially refreshing applying it during the hot summer days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this complimentary from skeepers and innisfree and im loving it! Love the applicator, love the feel of the serum and i think I’m seeing improvement! I’m so happy I got this right on time before i started a new job where I’ll be starting my shift at 5 am, this will totally help

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Green Tea Caffeine bright eye serum gifted to me by Innisfree is so nice! I love the cooling rollerball and really like how I can control how much product I want with the pump! A little goes a long way and the product doesn’t feel heavy on the skin. I usually wake up with puffy eyelids and i’ve definitely noticed a difference since using this serum! I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this skin, care, product line, and this eye serum is no different. Let me start by saying the applicator, for this is amazing as it has a metal ball that applies the serum beautifully under the eyes and on the lids well, leaving a cooling and soothing effect. This really melts and absorbs nicely into the skin, and my under eyes look more hydrated after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum complimentary from Innisfree in exchange for an honest review and I love the applicator tip, it's soothing and depuffing and great for a little eye massage. I like to put it in the fridge for an extra boost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Innisfree in exchange for my honest review. I was just telling my wife how I wanted to treat my undereyes as they were getting dark and dry. I have used eye creams before but they came in jars and I didn't like them as I have bigger hands and was a pin to try to scoop cream out. With this not only do I not have to scoop but it comes with a roller application. This makes it easier to apply even when I'm being lazy. The cream felt nice on my undereyes and hydrated them. I see a little bit of a difference in my darkness but I think I would need more time to see how effective it is. I do like it so far though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Innisfree in exchange for a review and so far I’m really loving this. It applies so easily and the roller ball gives a super good chilly feeling. I honestly don’t notice much of a difference in appearance (but I never really have) however it feels really hydrating and smooth. My only complaint is that the pump mechanism isn’t super smooth and it gives an uneven amount of serum each time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this eye serum! The metal applicator is so cooling and refreshing on the skin. The serum absorbs very nicely into the skin. This does not irritate my eyes at all. There is a very mild, clean scent but goes away almost instantly. I was gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum was gifted by innisfree. I really like the cooling roll-on applicator, which is very convenient to use under eyes. The serum is lightweight yet effective to hydrate around the eye areas. Also, it is infused with green tea as well as caffeine that helps depuff my eyes in the morning. As I used this product for just about a week, it’s a bit hard to tell if the serum helps brighten eyes. I will keep using it to see the result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love an eye product with caffeine.  I feel like it helps reduce the appearance of my dark circles.  I have been loving the Green Tea Caffeine Bright Eye Serum, gifted by Innisfree.  It contains green tea and hyaluronic acid.  It has a very unique pump and roll-on applicator.   I just pump the product up and apply it with the roller ball. I love how cooling the  roll-on massage tip feels so good on my skin.  My eyes look brighter and feel moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Istarted using this a few weeks ago and it definitely got rid of the puffiness quickly, and my fine lines are no longer visible. I liked the product as it doesnt sting unlike other products. It is also light and non-greasy.It dispenses the right amount which is just perfect for the eyes. Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Innisfree the green tea eye serum. After crying for two weeks straight and not being able to sleep much after an emotional breakup you would never be able to tell. I am telling you GET THIS in your cosmetic refrigerator NOWW!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum gifted by Innisfree is so refreshing. I love the applicator that is so simple to use and feels so refreshing and cooling when applying the serum. It is easy to pack and I love that my under eye skin instantly looks brighter and luminous. Works great for under make up too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: was gifted by Innisfree this caffeine brightening eye cream and I have been using it for the last week and I have been loving how bright it has been making my under eyes! I have been using it every morning and I can see a difference in how brighter my dark circles look. I’m excited to continue using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from innisfree for honest review .This serum feels so refreshing on the eyes and reduces puffiness , It brightens and reduces any puffiness and the roller ball is so cool and soothing.Absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took this eye cream on a recent trip and am so glad it’s the one I chose. It was the perfect thing for late nights and early mornings and sat beautifully under makeup. I loved the cooking applicator! Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off with the applicator, I love this applicator! It's currently summer in KY, so this rollerball feels wonderful under my eyes both in the AM and PM.   The product itself is good. I haven't noticed any drastic change with my under eyes, but I have yet to experience that with any eye serum/cream, but it feels good.   I have noticed on days when my eyes water, that I need to be cautious of rubbing my eyes because this product can irritate my eyes. On those days I just wash my face when it gets to that point. So be mindful of that.   gifted by innisfree but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best thing thats ever happend to my eyes. I  cant believe how truly amazing this works. My puffiness under the eyes magically disappear after I put this on. I'm so thankful for this product . Complimentary from innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved using this hydrating eye cream gifted by innisfree! Very easy to use and also portable! Can be used anytime of the day for a little pick me up! Glides on smoothly and just one pump is all you need to smooth around your eye area’ highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always had darkness under my eyes and soo hard to find something that actually works. This product not only helps visibly reduce the darkness but also reduces the puffiness around your cheekbones. The applicator has a rolling ball that helps distribute the formula properly. Feels amazing after applying and can notice a difference in the am. This product was gifted by innisfree.

I am in love with this product. I tend to lean towards anything with caffeine when it comes to eye products as a mom with 3 littles under 4. I love the cleanliness of the application since it’s a roller ball AND feels cool upon application. Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to be gifted by Innisfree &  Sleepers a chance to try out their Green Tea Caffeine Bright Eye Serum! I was thoroughly happy with this product. The pump and roller ball are awesome for easy application. I actually put the whole tube in the fridge so it would have an even more cooling effect. This product instantly de puffed my eyes. The product itself has this nice soft iridescent color that blends right into your skin. My eyes were left much brighter and way less puffy. Definitely plan to continue to use this product! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received complimentary from Innisfree in exchange for my honest review. This green tea+HA eye serum has the metal ball applicator of my dreams: kept in the fridge it'll immediately tackle those morning undereye bags and dark circles. The price is right though it only contains 10mL of product Vs the standard 15mL in most other eye cream jars.

reviews.review_title: Added to nightly skin care routine

I added this product to my nightly skin care routine and it makes the under eyes very hydrating! I’m going to continue to use this product and plan to purchase more! Gifted by Innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

This was my first time using an eye serum AM and PM, but now I’m hooked! I click once to get the product and split that between both eyes and use the roller balls to run it in. I was gifted by Innisfree this product for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by innisfree. The green tea caffeine eye serum seems to be taking care of the dark circles under my eyes! I put this in the fridge so the cold roller ball would also help with any puffiness that I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This feels nice but I did find it stung my eyes a bit.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely love k beauty anything. No exception

The metal ball applicator feels amazing. The product itself sinks right in and seems to brighten my eyes. I’m happy with it. Gifted by Innisfree

reviews.review_text: I gave this to my boyfriend to use and so far he likes it! Easy to apply every morning for him and it also feels nice. So far no results yet but a little bit truly goes a long way. Innisfree is a great Korean skincare brand so I do trust this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product! I found that it was very easy to use and has pretty fast results! It felt very soothing under my eyes and definitely made them feel brighter. I would definitely recommend this! Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_text: I did not know I needed this product but now I’m addicted! I love the cooling feeling on my eyes, it really helps when I’m tired or sick. My eyes also look visibly depuffed. Will definitely be keeping this in the rotation. Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating, cooling, and refreshing!! I really enjoy this under eye serum. The roller ball adds to the cooling effect and it is a great addition to my early morning routine. Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye serum helps my eyes look brighter. It also keeps my skin moisturized. The cooling roller ball feels relaxing to use.  I really like that the texture is lightweight. You only need to use a little. This was gifted by innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is incredible. The cooling roll on tip is everything, i love how it applied the cream with a cooling effect, that helps with puffiness around my eyes. It was so hydrating and soo soft! Gifted by innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Innisfree. This is such a beautiful lightweight eye serum that is easy to apply with the roller ball applicator that has a cooling sensation on application. It absorbs beautifully and instantly smooths and hydrates my tired and dull looking skin around my eye area. It makes this are look refreshed and revitalized. The lightweight texture does not bother my sensitive eyes and brightens and depuffs the eye area. This is definitely the boost the skin around my eyes needs! I highly recommend this eye serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am 5 weeks postpartum and this has save me! I don’t look tired at all and I wake up 4 times in the middle of the night. The ingredients are the best and the roller is amazing! My under eyes look softer and bright.  Love love it. Totally recommend this. This was gifted by Innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am very satisfied with the results. I've noticed brightness under my eyes, and most importantly, less puffiness. I use it every morning before applying makeup. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs to reduce puffiness on a daily basis.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a top tier applicator! It instantly cools my under eyes and feels so refreshing. I‘be used an ample amount for the last week and already notice it running low because I have to pump a couple of times to get the product out. Nonetheless, it’s SO hydrating and my concealer blends perfectly on top of it. Gifted by Innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by innisfree. I was super excited to get this product because I wake up with some serious puffiness around my eyes. The roller ball is nice and cooling and the product itself goes on a very wet gel but dries down without any stickiness. I think it’s a great pick-me-up in the mornings!

reviews.review_title: Nourishing Caffeine Boost For Tired Eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Innisfree the Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Eye Serum complementary for my honest review and feedback.  This is a light weight eye serum that is so easy to use! I love the applicator - it had a cooling roll on massage tip. This product instantly hydrates my tired eyes and makes them feel refreshed. If you need amplified hydration under your eyes this is the product you should purchase! The roller ball is so soothing and helps wake my eyes up every morning. I personally love that this is a lightweight formula since I don’t like using a heavy product under my eyes (I try to avoid getting milia). This definitely helps depuff and brighten my eyes when I use it consistently - I notice a huge difference!   It is a nourishing caffeine boost for tired eyes. My boyfriend doesn’t have a skincare routine but I think he would benefit from using this product and it would help brighten his dark circles.  I also appreciate that the expiration date is clearly printed on the product!

Stunning soothing formula!! I will buy this again and again. It definitely depuffs and hydrates. My under eyes are sooooo dry and this helps a lot. I also love the applicator. The metal is cool and soothing. Gifted by Innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wouldnt expect this thing to work miracles but it smells really good and it wakes my eyes up. I enjoy adding this to my routine especially during the hotter months as it feels very cool and refreshing.  Goes on smooth, soothing gel, I like the cool effect it has under my eyes

reviews.review_title: A must have for the eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from innisfree to try out and see how it does for me and I just love how well it made my eyes brighter and full of life. It has a little roller ball on it so it goes under your eyes very good! My eyes are no longer puffy or dark circles. This is definitely worth buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by innisfree ! I absolutely love this product. I have puffy eyes in the morning and this product has completely changed that. The cool roller ball and formula has reduced the puffiness in my eyes significantly. It has also kept my under eyes super moisturized. I would absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye serum instantly makes me look more awake!  It helps to get rid of puffiness under my eyes in seconds.  I often have dark circles, so this serum helps with that too.  The hydration it provides makes my makeup go on better too. It’s easy to use-After releasing a little serum from the tube, you use the metal ball roller to help spread the product around the eye area. I find it to be so refreshing. Since the product is so light I don’t have to worry about it causing milia like some eye serums/creams do.  I use this several times a day to keep my eye area skin looking great.  Complimentary from Innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a ton of the skincare products from Innisfree and this product certainly did not disappoint! It is super hydrating, feels super refreshing, and my eyes always feel so much more awake in the morning after applying it! I highly recommend putting it in the fridge for a few minutes before using it if you want it to feel even more refreshing and cool on your undereyes! Gifted by Innisfree!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use the Innisfree green tea line everyday- the HA and the moisturizer and was so excited to add this eye cream to my morning routine! It has the same light tea scent and goes on smoothly to really hydrate under my eyes without leaving any residue that may mess with my makeup application. The caffeine helps to brighten under my eyes and soaks in to give them a less dark appearance. The cooling rollerball feels so nice. So far I’m really happy with this affordable eye product! Gifted by Innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing for tired eyes. It has a cool metal applicator that de- puffs the under eyes and smoothes it out. This eye cream included caffeine in it which is very hydrating and amazing for the under eye area. gifted by innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! The rollerball is super cooling and feels great under the eyes. This is great for using in the mornings when you’re tired and need some waking up. I love the green tea as well. gifted by innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The applicator is so soothing to use.  The cooling roll-on tip is a great massage to depute my eyes after a long days of shift. The serum infused with green tea for antioxidant. My eyes feels nourish after each use. No sensitivity so far. Gifted by Innisfree.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite eye serum! My under eyes tend to get puffy in the morning, and my whole eye area sometimes feels dry and sensitive at night. I like how this comes with a cooling rollerball to soothe me day and night! So happy to have gotten this gifted by Innisfree!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The caffeinated eye serum from green tea is the best for my skin after a long day. This serum is applied with a refreshing roller ball that massages and softens the serum on my skin and has helped me a lot with my dark circles, I loved it, thank you very much for gifted me Innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Innis Beauty and this product saved my under eyes! My under eyes were so dark and this product made them lighter in just a few days. I highly recommend this product for anyone who struggles with dark under eyes. Sits so beautifully under makeup and is the perfect under eye cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the feeling and results of this eye roller. Not only did it minimize my puffy under eyes but it also lightened the darkness of that area. The cooling effect when using the roller was very satisfying. Gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how practical this product is, just swirl and go! The massage ball is definitely the best part of it. I love the cooling and hydrating sensation it leaves when applied. The size is perfect you can take it anywhere. I received this product complimentary from innisfree in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Green Tea Caffeine Bright-Eye Serum complimentary from Innisfree. I love how cooling this feels on my under eye area, especially after a late night. I also like how it makes my eye area look smooth and hydrated. It works really well under makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the green tea line is great for sensitive skin. i have been using the face serum for a long time. this eye serum is really easy to use and hygienic because of the metal rollerball applicator. i have sensitive skin and break out easily but this does not cause irritation for me in the undereye area. gifted by innisfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this eye serum complimentary from Innisfree for review purposes. I really like the texture of this serum, it is so lightweight and absorbs almost immediately into my skin. I keep it in the fridge so it is always cooling and depuffing when I apply it under my eyes. It does not have a sticky or tacky residue after application and does not cause my makeup to pill over it. I'm excited to continue using it to see long term effects on my eye bags.
